short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reminds you to take a break periodically and rest your eyes while working on the computer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features Overview:

Protect Your Eyesight: Get regular reminders to take breaks and rest your eyes.
Customizable Settings: Adjust reminder intervals and messages to suit your needs.
Reminder Interval: Default set to every 60 minutes.
Reminder Message: Protect your eyes! Take a break...
Notification Settings: Auto-hide notifications after 20 seconds.
Disable Notifications: Temporarily disable notifications for specific periods or websites.
Do Not Disturb Mode: Set quiet hours to avoid interruptions.
Theme Options: Customize the look and feel of the extension.
About: An open-source project designed for individuals passionate about their work who need reminders to take breaks.

About the Developer:
Hello! I'm Partho, a full-stack engineer and co-founder of Data Matric. Alongside full-stack development, I am focused on building AI-driven software. This project is my effort to help people protect their eyesight while working on computers.

Tech Stack Used:
JavaScript
TypeScript
React.js
